preference.name: GET_CAS_DATA_DOWNLOADER_URL
preference.preference_description: Web application url of GET_CASDataDownloader. Replace CHANGE_ME with the web server host name

preference.name: GET_RELEASE_CLERK_DISTRIBUTION_LIST
preference.preference_description: For Production environment use the value: RELEASE.CLERK@ge.com For Non-Production environment use the value: NONPROD.releaseclerk@ge.com

preference.name: GET_WaitTime_For_File_Transfer
preference.preference_description: Custom preference to wait for file transfer, Default value is set to 2. Value can be changed based on the file transfer speed in the environments

preference.name: Mail_server_name
preference.preference_description: Information about the mail gateway server. This is a site preference. It can be set to either a mail server name or to a numeric IP address. The mail server name should be a machine running a send mail daemon. Leaving it as "your mail server machine" while the "Mail_OSMail_activated" preference is true may give you errors telling you to set this preference if you try to use the "Send" command.

preference.name: Mail_server_port
preference.preference_description: Sets the port number used by the SMTP mail server to send OS mail. This is a site preference. The default value is 25.

preference.name: GET_T4O_Transfer_Decision
preference.preference_description: Preference to turn on/off T4O Transfer. YES or NO are valid values.

preference.name: WEB_default_site_server
preference.preference_description: Defines the URL of the default site server used for mail notifications (CR-Notify) and other server oriented tasks. The format is for instance "www.foo.com:8080".
